content: MFT-FOX VT L Bracket Vertical fiberglass bracket - Large ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Brackets- - - ### FEATURES:Features Thermal bridge-free solution Glass-fiber reinforced plastic and aluminium compound for low thermal conductivity and high load performance Easier installation – helping hand and clear markings to simplify bracket fastening and rail alignment Total system solution – from Hilti you get optimized tools, consumables and services for every step of ventilated façade installation Hole diameter 6.5 mm for DX fastening and screws for concrete, steel and wood Applications Suitable for low-energy buildings, Passivhaus and Minergie standard Suitable for low-energy buildings ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Polyamide, EN AW-6063 T66 Width: 62 mm Height: 150 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Polyamide, EN AW-6063 T66 | Width | 62 mm | Height | 150 mm ### ITEMS- 2096981 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 220 L 6,5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096982 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 220 L 11 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096983 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 240 L 6,5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096984 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 240 L 11 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096985 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 260 L 6,5 - Package Size 20 pc - 2096986 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 260 L 11 - Package Size 20 pc - 2096987 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 280 L 6,5 - Package Size 20 pc - 2096988 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 280 L 11 - Package Size 20 pc - 2096989 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 300 L 6,5 - Package Size 20 pc - 2096990 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 300 L 11 - Package Size 20 pc - 2096991 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 320 L 6,5 - Package Size 20 pc - 2096992 - Bracket MFT-FOX VT 320 L 11 - Package Size 20 pc
